param.name: existingDeploymentName
param.description: The deployment Name that this automation will clone and turn into a blueprint ready for consumption

attrib.name: accessToken

attrib.name: restHost

attrib.name: username

attrib.name: password
attrib.description: the password of the VRA admin user

attrib.name: deploymentID
attrib.description: the ID of the deployment being saved as a blueprint

attrib.name: blueprintID
attrib.description: the blueprint ID the deployment was provisioned from

attrib.name: blueprintVersion
attrib.description: the blueprint version the deployment was provisioned from

attrib.name: deploymentResourcesData
attrib.description: used for storing the relevant data for cloned vms and here placement in the blueprints

attrib.name: vmFolder
attrib.description: The VM Folder object created for the blueprint during the automation

attrib.name: newBlueprintYaml
attrib.description: the YAML of the new blueprint

attrib.name: newBlueprintJson
attrib.description: the JSON representation of the new blueprint

attrib.name: snapshotName
attrib.description: name of snashot for all new cloned vms to be used in vra blueprint to provision linked clones

attrib.name: projectId
attrib.description: the ID of the project the deployment exists under and that the new blueprint will be created in its context

attrib.name: parentVmFolder
attrib.description: the folder under which each blueprint will have a folder with its templates

attrib.name: newBlueprintID
attrib.description: the received ID of the new blueprint after it has been created
